Post-Match Reflections: And that’s me done. We’ll be back (much) later for Australia v Afghanistan with Mitch Marsh’s team having the same opportunity as India had here: sorting their semi-final slot with a game to spare.
Others: India celebrate their victory over Bangladesh.
It’s done. India are surely on their way to a semi-final next week. The only question is who will it be against?
